Reviews.Title: “Top Value in Downtown Toronto”
Reviews.Author: kingstonian99
Reviews.Content: attended conference wife accompanied shop downtown hotel unbelievable value stayed special promotional shopping weekend rate 139 night taxes rate supposed king bed free valet parking privileges 20 eaton centre gift card checkout unfortunately ran gift cards promptly 20 bill chance notice rest amenities delivered promised proved handy especially valet parking hotel located downtown toronto numerous fast food outlets nearby including mcdonalds pizza pizza starbucks tim hortons eaton centre 10 minute walk college park closer bloor street little farther subway station 2 minutes travel distance makes pretty easy using public transit airport union station activities walking distance 20 30 minutes able afford rate hotel larger clean businesses airlines employees cant bad didnt spend time hotel free internet help deciding overall value excellent amenities definitely
